attributes.additional_details: The Net Zero project has been pushed by politicians from all the major parties, it is time to give the people of the UK the chance to decide if the effort and cost is worth it
attributes.background: Give the people of the UK a referendum on whether we should continue Net Zero or stop the whole Net Zero project

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum on achieving net zero goals.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701342
